revised_title: High-Speed Diesel Engine Development and Fuel Injection Systems
tldr: This article discusses the development of high-speed diesel engines and the challenges faced in creating fuel injection systems to achieve optimal performance. The author explains the differences between high-speed and low-speed engines and the importance of using a rigid structure with lightweight moving parts. The article also describes the combustion process in diesel engines and the development of a fuel injection system that meters and times the delivery of small fuel quantities accurately.
